Is there currently a way to stop crawling a specific host in a running job?
I can pause or restart the job from the latest checkpoint, but starting over
again isn't really an option.

Thanks in advance.

--0023547c89c91fb10e04990c73ef
Content-Type: text/html; charset=ISO-8859-1
